author: COMSOL
description: This example describes the simultaneous flow of two immiscible fluids in porous media in a multistep inlet pressure experiment. Model solves for the pressure and the degree saturation for the air and water within a representative volume and so track saturation levels rather than estimating a discrete location for the air-water interface.
label: twophase_flow_column.mph
name: root
